person_say: I'm studying in a noisy environment and it's hard to focus. Do you have any suggestions on how I can improve my concentration?
animal_say: I get that! How does the noise make you feel while you're studying? Do you find it affecting your productivity?

person_say: Yes, the noise makes me feel quite distracted and anxious. It definitely affects my productivity because I can't concentrate on my work.
animal_say: I understand how tough that can be! There's a calming bear named Bruno who specializes in relaxation and stress release. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds wonderful! I would love to learn some relaxation techniques from him.
animal_say: Fantastic! Bruno will help you find some peace and focus. Let's go see him!
